sections.name: Assessment of Work Stress
sections.summary:
All Questions are Mandatory. Provide responses to the questions below based on your experiences in your workplace in the last 6 months.

Instructions for use: It is recognized that working environments may affect worker well-being. This series of questions is intended to assess stress due to work related factors and symptoms of stress. It can be used among diverse group of employees, especially managerial / supervisory level employees.

sections.name: Assessment of Symptoms suggestive of Stress
sections.summary: We wish to understand if you have experienced any of the below symptoms in the last 6 months

sections.name: Depression Anxiety Stress Scales (DASS 21)
sections.summary:
Please read each statement that applied to you over the past week.
There are no right or wrong answers. Do not spend too much time on any statement.

heading: WORK STRESS AND ASSOCIATED SYMPTOMS ASSESSMENT
